A simple set of wrenches, pliers, and screwdrivers used for basic repairs on weapons, armor, and electronics in the field. While sufficient for minor fixes, they lack the precision needed for advanced modifications or delicate equipment work.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Requires Suitable Materials
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable At Mechanic's Workshop
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Note: %c[ui_gray_2] A technician could use this to modify weapons and armor

A more refined collection of precision instruments, including specialized screwdrivers, soldering equipment, and diagnostic meters. Ideal for repairing advanced firearms, upgrading protective gear, or tuning equipment, these tools are valued by experienced stalkers and technicians alike.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Requires Suitable Materials
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable At Mechanic's Workshop
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Note: %c[ui_gray_2] A technician could use this to modify weapons and armor

A rare and highly coveted set of professional-grade tools, including micro-welders, precision calipers, and advanced diagnostic devices. Only the most skilled technicians can fully utilize them, allowing for complex modifications and high-end repairs on weapons, armor, and equipment.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Requires Suitable Materials
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable At Mechanic's Workshop
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Note: %c[ui_gray_2] A technician could use this to modify weapons and armor

A compact chemical lab containing measuring tools, burners, vials, and mixing agents for synthesizing drugs and medications in the field. Essential for those who craft their own stimulants, medications, or enhancers.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Requires Suitable Materials
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable At Mechanic's Workshop

A specialized kit tailored for firearm maintenance, modification, and part fabrication, including files, punches, torque wrenches, and precision cleaning supplies. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for recycling damaged ammunition and the creation of better variants.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Requires Suitable Materials
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Usable At Mechanic's Workshop

A durable pair of Ukrainian-issue military binoculars used by stalkers to scout distant anomalies, hostile territory, or potential safe paths. Equipped with a zoom function, reliable optics like these can be the difference between spotting danger early and walking straight into an ambush.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Equip In Binoculars Slot

A compact, multi-purpose tool equipped with blades, screwdrivers, and other essential implements, perfect for quick repairs, tool disassembly, cutting, and survival tasks. Lightweight and reliable, it’s a trusted companion in a single pocket-sized tool.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Disassembling Tool

A small collection of personal care items in a nylon bag, including a razor, comb, scissors, and toothbrush. While basic grooming helps preserve a sense of normalcy, others sometimes repurpose these tools for field maintenance.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Disassembling Tool

A small pack containing a handful of bolts and empty rounds used as a cheap alternative for anomaly navigation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Contains 20-30 'Bolts' and/or 'Empty Cartridges'

A compact, fully packed sleeping bag designed to offer basic comfort and insulation during cold nights. Lightweight and easy to carry, it provides essential warmth and protection from the elements in makeshift campsites.
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]Sleeping in the open may attract predators.
 Does not protect from radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Place Sleeping Bag, Sleep
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use Sleeping Bag Sack to pick up

An empty sack designed to store a sleeping bag.
 
 %c[ui_gray_2]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Pick Up Sleeping Bag
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use while near Sleeping Bag

A portable, fully packed camping tent providing shelter from the elements. Essential for extended expeditions, it offers temporary safety and privacy in the wilderness of the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_red]WARNING: %c[ui_gray_2]Sleeping in the open may attract predators.
 Does not protect from radiation.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Place Tent, Sleep
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use Camping Tent Bag (Empty) to pick up

An empty bag used to store a tent.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Pick Up Tent
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white]NOTE: %c[ui_gray_2]Use while near Tent
A large, printed map with some marked locations and hand-written sheets of paper. Apparently the owner was an artefact hunter.\n \n

Every stalker is aware of the importance of reliable weaponry. That's the reason a daily and thorough examination of your shooter is vital to your survival. Stalkers often count their ammo and clean it to minimize the risk of a weapon jam in the heat of battle.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A kit containing oils and tools used for basic firearm maintenance. Useful when out exploring, but also quite heavy.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] drag onto the item you wish to repair

A makeshift kit of sewing equipment and spare materials for outfit maintenance. Useful for repairing holes and tears in armor.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] drag onto the item you wish to repair

A scrap of paper containing your equipment condition.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] usable for equipment condition assessment

The best tool for opening locks and unhinging doors.
 There's rumors of a famous stalker who used a crowbar as a weapon with the inscription "Property of Black Mesa" written upon it.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Unlimited Uses

A bulky, durable and powerful lamp running on lithium-ion batteries.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:

A reliable, water-proof source of fire is essential in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Cooking, Smoking, Lighting Fire

There is almost no point in carrying a lighter if you can't use it. Experienced stalkers always remember to fill their lighters with fuel before departing on long excursions deep into the Zone.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Refueling Lighters

Small cases of plastic bags containing pills and herbs used for managing and producing drugs.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[ui_red] • %c[pda_white] Unusable
